# University of Paris Cité Portfolio Project

This is a React portfolio website showcasing student projects from different academic grades at the University of Paris Cité.

## Project Specifications
- React with Vite for modern development
- Responsive design for all devices
- Student project galleries with filtering by grade level
- Professional university branding and theme
- Project showcase with student profiles
- Modern UI/UX following best practices

## Development Guidelines
- Use TypeScript for type safety
- Implement responsive design with Tailwind CSS
- Follow React best practices and hooks
- Ensure accessibility standards
- Use modern ES6+ JavaScript features
- Maintain clean, readable code structure
